title: Ticket #5428: condor_q should make use of full width of console for output
description:
condor_q should not always truncate it's output to 80 columns, it should instead make use of the full width of the console it is running in (mostly to display the last column of data - the command/description).

It should also resize columns and headings to fit the data. In particular the Cluster/Proc field needs to be wider for many pools.
